dcterms:creator: J. Xia
N. Yokoya
B. Adriano
C. Broni-Bediako
dcterms:description: A large-scale high-resolution land cover mapping dataset composed of 8-class land cover labels at a 0.25â€“0.5m spatial resolution of 5000 images, covering 97 regions from 44 countries across 6 continents. The dataset presents challenges due to wide region variation, vague categories, and complex scenes.
dcterms:title: OpenEarthMap

dcterms:description: The Potsdam dataset consists of 38 very fine resolution aerial images at a size of 6000x6000 pixels, involving 6-class geo-objects and four multispectral bands. It is widely used for verifying remote sensing image segmentation methods.
dcterms:title: Potsdam

dcterms:creator: J. Wang
Z. Zheng
A. Ma
X. Lu
Y. Zhong
dcterms:description: The LoveDA dataset contains 5987 fine-resolution optical remote sensing images collected from three cities in China, with land cover categories including building, road, water, barren, forest, agriculture, and background. It presents challenges due to its urban and rural scenes.
dcterms:title: LoveDA
